Package org.xml.sax

SAX exceptions and error handling for ARP.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ErrorHandler Basic interface for SAX error handlers.
 

Exception Summary
SAXException Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning.
SAXParseException Encapsulate an XML parse error or warning.
 

Package org.xml.sax Description

SAX exceptions and error handling for ARP.

See online Xerces documentation for non-ARP specific information.
